text: Germany, Pale Mother () is a 1980 West German drama movie directed by Helma Sanders-Brahms and starring Eva Mattes, Ernst Jacobi, Elisabeth Stepanek, Angelika Thomas, Rainer Friedrichsen, Gisela Stein, Fritz Lichtenhahn. == Other websites == * * Category:1980 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Helma Sanders-Brahms
title: Germany, Pale Mother
